title: Abfahrt for Android Wear
summary: Shows you real-time public transport data of stations near you in Vienna.
description: Abfahrt for Android Wear is your companion in Vienna, Austria. Checking the departure of the next bus at the station around the corner? No problem. You have to go to a station near you, but don’t know the exact location? Activate the map view.The station and line view support ambient mode, so you always know the latest departures with a simple glance at your wrist. With the line view, you also have an overview of your environment via the map – however, your location is only refreshed while the display is active, to save battery.This app is a watch-only app, for Android Wear 2.0. You can download it via the Play Store on your Watch.Permission details:* Location: To show stations around youData Source: Stadt Wien – https://data.wien.gv.at
descriptionHTML:
Abfahrt for Android Wear is your companion in Vienna, Austria. Checking the departure of the next bus at the station around the corner? No problem. You have to go to a station near you, but don’t know the exact location? Activate the map view.

The station and line view support ambient mode, so you always know the latest departures with a simple glance at your wrist. With the line view, you also have an overview of your environment via the map – however, your location is only refreshed while the display is active, to save battery.

This app is a watch-only app, for Android Wear 2.0. You can download it via the Play Store on your Watch.

Permission details:
* Location: To show stations around you

Data Source: Stadt Wien – https://data.wien.gv.at
comments: Tolle app! Ein must-have für Wien.
recentChanges: Stations can now be favorited for easy access at the station list.
